Class Plot

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • Plot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Plot
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Class Plot plots the post-processing results (distribution plots).It is called only from the GUI of NGCE tool (NGCEframe.java).
    IT IS A BETA VERSION.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
